channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Biden hosts first 'Creator Economy Conference' for influencers to talk AI, privacy and more
item.description: President Joe Biden recently signed a law to potentially ban TikTok, the China-based social site that has dominated the content creation industry.

item.title: Some hedge funds thought AI would help them beat the market. Then things got real.
item.description: The Eurekahedge AI Hedge Fund Index has lagged the S&P 500, proving that the machines aren‚Äôt learning from their investing mistakes.

item.title: Watch now: ETF Edge on rethinking portfolio protection with "buffered" ETFs
Inflation reports clear way for Fed to cut, but how much is still the question
item.description: Markets now expect a better chance for a quarter percentage point cut in September, but are still leaving the door open.

item.title: Mortgage refinancing surges 35% in one week, as interest rates hit lowest level in over a year
item.description: Applications to refinance a home loan surged 35% last week compared with the previous week, according to the Mortgage Bankers Association's seasonally adjusted index.

item.title: Dow gains as inflation slows to 3-year low: Live updates
item.description: Stocks hovered near the flatline on Wednesday, following a largely in line July inflation print.

item.title: Here's the inflation breakdown for July 2024 ‚Äî in one chart
item.description: The consumer price index has risen 2.9% since July 2023, the lowest annual reading since March 2021.

item.title: Wizz Air launches $550 'all you can fly' annual subscription pass
item.description: Travelers in Europe can now take unlimited flights for 499 euros ($550) a year under a new travel subscription service from budget carrier Wizz Air.

item.title: Major players are buying puts. Why?

item.title: 6 ways to build a successful retirement
item.description: What people in their 50s, 60s and 70s should know about navigating life after work

item.title: Goldman believes this maker of software for banks offers 30% upside
item.description: The Wall Street investment bank says headwinds around cloud-based software provider nCino are clearing just as the higher-for-longer rate backdrop fades.

item.title: Philippe Laffont's Coatue entered into Paramount last quarter amid weakness
item.description: The firm opened a position worth more than $38 million in the legacy media company.
